p: Two months-old male Wistar rats from Multidisciplinary Center for Biological Investigation in Laboratory Animals Science (CEMIB - Campinas, Brazil) were housed at 4 or 5 rats per cage and maintained in controlled lighting (12:12-h light/dark, lights on at 6:00 a.m.) and temperature (23°C ± 1°C) conditions, with ad libitum access to food and water.
